We need someone exceptional — not just great at coding, but with a deep interest in solving real-world problems. You'll need to make intelligent trade-offs and decisions that balance short-term needs with long-term goals, knowing how to move fast without breaking what matters. If you can take ownership, drive initiatives, and make smart decisions that align with the realities of a startup environment, this is the place for you.
You’ve explored the depths of big problems, and you’re recognized as a leader in your space. You’re driven by curiosity and a desire to understand complex challenges, and you’re looking for a new opportunity to apply your skills in a way that truly makes an impact. You have a motor — a relentless drive to get things done — and you produce high-quality code at a fast pace.
Qualifications

4+ years of experience in software engineering, with a proven track record of exceptional work.
Outstanding coding skills and the ability to quickly master new languages or frameworks.
Familiarity with tools and technologies like React, TypeScript, Go, Java, Mongo, Node, SQL, and Python is a plus.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to make data-driven decisions and offer clear, strategic recommendations.
Demonstrated expertise and depth in a specific domain, with a curiosity that drives you to explore and understand the complexities and nuances of the problems you work on.
Genuine passion for tackling complex problems and an authentic interest in the commodities trading or logistics space.
Ready to engage with customers daily and make meaningful contributions to their implementations.

Benefits

Competitive salary
Meaningful equity in a rapidly growing company.
Flexible working arrangements, with a hybrid office schedule
Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
Opportunity to shape the future of an old-school yet existentially vital industry to the world.
A collaborative and fast-paced environment where your work has consequence and impact.

founders.name: Todd Li
founders.bio: Todd is the founder of several venture-backed startups. Before his startup journey at Retell, Todd worked at Google Ads as a software engineer.

founders.name: Evie Wang
founders.bio:
Evie is the Co-founder and CMO of Retell AI
She has a design background and a deep understanding of B2B business as she spent 3 years as a Product Designer at Bytedance.

founders.name: Bing Wu
founders.bio:
Co-founder & CEO at Retell AI.
Enthusiastic about the human brain and AI, Bing spent three years as a product manager at ByteDance/TikTok, where he led B2B and consumer products that delighted billions.

Before joining ByteDance/TikTok, Bing founded two investor-backed startups in college, generating six-figure revenues.

founders.name: Weijia Yu
founders.bio:
Weijia excels in product and software development, with a specialization in machine learning. At Meta, he spent three years as a PM hybrid Tech Lead within Facebook product team.

Prior to Meta, Weijia led app development at ObEN, a Series B AI tech startup, providing full-stack AI solutions including TTS(text-to-speech), computer vision and chatbot.

founders.name: Zexia Zhang
founders.bio: Zexia is the co-founder and CTO of Retell AI. Passionate about ML, Zexia is always at the frontier of advancing speech technologies. Before Retell, Zexia spent four years at Google where he led the development of next-gen speech translation experience, and NLP solutions for call analysis.

detailed_description_html:
Retell is a AI phone call platform automating call center communications, including sales, support, customer engagement, and retention calls (e.g., promotional calls, debt collection, etc.).

We closed a $4.7M seed round and achieved remarkable growth, reaching $5M in annualized revenue within 10 months. Retell AI is proudly backed by Alt Capital, Y Combinator, and other leading investors.

Position: Founding Senior Software Engineer

Job type: Full-time, 40 hr/week onsite with flexible hours + 25-30 hr/week WFH

Salary: $200K - $310K

Equity: 0.50% - 1.25%

Bonus: $20k - $100K

Location: Redwood City, CA, US

US visas: Sponsors Visa & Greencard

Benefits: 100% medical, dental, vision insurance covereage. Unlimited breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. Gym, daily communte fee reimbursed. Internet, phone bill covered.
